div.div: We are One Heart. One Lovejoy. Learn more about our award-winning academics, fine arts and athletic programs.
At Lovejoy, Kids Come First. Families living outside of district boundaries may apply for tuition-based enrollment.
Your one-stop location for information regarding our @Home Learning.
Lovejoy ISD provides clear and relevant financial information in a transparent, easily accessible and understandable format.

Welcome to the Lovejoy Independent School District where Kids Come First. The spring of 2005 was the first time I walked into the little red school house. Together with my teammates we worked to build the secondary program in Lovejoy and the Graduate Profile - the pillars and foundation of what we wanted Lovejoy ISD to become. In 2006 we opened the secondary program and began a journey to surround our students with the best educators who strive to exceed the individual needs of each student and prepare them for the future of their choosing. We are honored to be named one of the best school districts in Texas and the nation. This only happens as a result of our core beliefs and the community that works daily to live our values. It is truly one of my greatest honors to lead our Leopards and serve as Superintendent. We are One Heart. One Lovejoy.
